screeningSummary: Prank caller with classic abduction story - admits to being dared by friends
arcNotes: Prank call with classic abduction tropes, caller is being playful, breaks the fourth wall at the end

lines.text: You're on the air. What's your story?
lines.voiceText: You're on the air. What's your story?

lines.text: Alright, you're on. Make it quick.
lines.voiceText: Alright, you're on. Make it quick.

lines.text: YOU ARE ON THE AIR! Tell us your story!
lines.voiceText: YOU ARE ON THE AIR! Tell us your story!

lines.text: You're on. What's this about?
lines.voiceText: You're on. What's this about?

lines.text: You're on. So?
lines.voiceText: You're on. So?

lines.text: Oh good, a caller! What's your story?
lines.voiceText: Oh good, a caller! What's your story?

lines.text: You're on. State your experience concisely.
lines.voiceText: You're on. State your experience concisely.

lines.text: Okay, so this is gonna sound crazy, but I've been rehearsing what to say for three days. Last Tuesday, I was at my buddy's place out past Miller Road, maybe had a few drinks, and then... light. Coming from everywhere.
lines.voiceText: Okay, so this is gonna sound crazy, but I've been rehearsing what to say for three days. Last Tuesday, I was at my buddy's place out past Miller Road, maybe had a few drinks, and then... light. Coming from everywhere.

lines.text: Go on.
lines.voiceText: Go on.

lines.text: ...go on.
lines.voiceText: ...go on.

lines.text: OH WOW! Go on!!
lines.voiceText: OH WOW! Go on!!

lines.text: Of course there was. Go on.
lines.voiceText: Of course there was. Go on.

lines.text: Fine. Go on.
lines.voiceText: Fine. Go on.

lines.text: This is great! Go on!
lines.voiceText: This is great! Go on!

lines.text: Continue describing the phenomenon.
lines.voiceText: Continue describing the phenomenon.

lines.text: Next thing I know, I'm in this room. White, no doors I could see. And there's... look, I know how this sounds, okay? But there were three of them. Gray skin, big eyes, the classic look you know from every movie ever.
lines.voiceText: Next thing I know, I'm in this room. White, no doors I could see. And there's... look, I know how this sounds, okay? But there were three of them. Gray skin, big eyes, the classic look you know from every movie ever.

lines.text: Three beings. What happened next?
lines.voiceText: Three beings. What happened next?

lines.text: Three of them... alright. What happened?
lines.voiceText: Three of them... alright. What happened?

lines.text: THREE of them?! This is UNREAL! What happened next?!
lines.voiceText: THREE of them?! This is UNREAL! What happened next?!

lines.text: Three gray aliens. Let me guess - they did experiments?
lines.voiceText: Three gray aliens. Let me guess - they did experiments?

lines.text: Three of them. Okay, what'd they do?
lines.voiceText: Three of them. Okay, what'd they do?

lines.text: THREE CLASSIC ALIENS! I love this! What happened?!
lines.voiceText: THREE CLASSIC ALIENS! I love this! What happened?!

lines.text: Three entities. Describe their behavior and any subsequent events.
lines.voiceText: Three entities. Describe their behavior and any subsequent events.

lines.text: They did... tests. I woke up in my buddy's backyard with scoop marks on my arm. I've been staring at those marks for three days, trying to figure out if I dreamed the whole thing or...
lines.voiceText: They did... tests. I woke up in my buddy's backyard with scoop marks on my arm. I've been staring at those marks for three days, trying to figure out if I dreamed the whole thing or...

lines.text: Classic abduction story. Look, you could have gotten this from any UFO book or movie from the last fifty years. Next caller.
lines.voiceText: Classic abduction story. Look, you could have gotten this from any UFO book or movie from the last fifty years. Next caller.

lines.text: Right... scoop marks, classic. You know how this sounds, right? Next.
lines.voiceText: Right... scoop marks, classic. You know how this sounds, right? Next.

lines.text: This is INCREDIBLE! Wait, scoop marks? Let me see if our team can - oh wait. NEXT CALLER!
lines.voiceText: This is INCREDIBLE! Wait, scoop marks? Let me see if our team can - oh wait. NEXT CALLER!

lines.text: Scoop marks. Of course. Classic abduction story, word for word. Next caller.
lines.voiceText: Scoop marks. Of course. Classic abduction story, word for word. Next caller.

lines.text: Scoop marks. That's the oldest trick in the book. Next caller.
lines.voiceText: Scoop marks. That's the oldest trick in the book. Next caller.

lines.text: SCOOP MARKS! I can't believe you just said that with a straight face! This is WHY I love this show! NEXT!
lines.voiceText: SCOOP MARKS! I can't believe you just said that with a straight face! This is WHY I love this show! NEXT!

lines.text: This narrative contains every conventional abduction trope. The specificity of "scoop marks" suggests external influence rather than genuine experience. Next caller.
lines.voiceText: This narrative contains every conventional abduction trope. The specificity of "scoop marks" suggests external influence rather than genuine experience. Next caller.

lines.text: *bursts out laughing* I'm sorry, Vern! My buddies dared me! I can't believe you bought it for like two seconds! This is why I love this show!
lines.voiceText: *bursts out laughing* I'm sorry, Vern! My buddies dared me! I can't believe you bought it for like two seconds! This is why I love this show!
